alert.note: Alert for Adams; Cumberland; Dauphin; Franklin; Lancaster; Lebanon; York (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 7:03PM EST by NWS State College
info.description: ...A GUSTY SHOWER WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN LANCASTER...ADAMS... YORK...SOUTHEASTERN DAUPHIN...SOUTHEASTERN FRANKLIN...CENTRAL CUMBERLAND AND SOUTHWESTERN LEBANON COUNTIES THROUGH 745 PM EST... At 703 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower along a line extending from near Carlisle to Waynesboro. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... York, Carlisle, Lower Allen, Hanover, Hershey, Weigelstown, Elizabethtown, Waynesboro, Mechanicsburg, Middletown, Gettysburg, Mount Joy, New Cumberland, Parkville, Hampton, Shiloh, East York, Steelton, Stonybrook-Wilshire and West York. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This gusty shower may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EST for south central Pennsylvania.
